entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023
